thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-YRC Worldwide Provides Quarter-To-Date Operating Data for Q1 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-YRC Worldwide Provides Quarter-To-Date Operating Data for Q1 2018
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - YRC Worldwide Inc:
* YRC WORLDWIDE INC - AT YRC FREIGHT, JANUARY 2018 TONNAGE PER DAY DECREASED ABOUT 6.1% COMPARED TO JANUARY 2017
* YRC WORLDWIDE INC - AT YRC FREIGHT, FEBRUARY 2018 TONNAGE PER DAY DECREASED ABOUT 1.3% COMPARED TO FEBRUARY 2017
* YRC WORLDWIDE INC - AT REGIONAL SEGMENT, JANUARY 2018 TONNAGE PER DAY DECREASED ABOUT 0.8% COMPARED TO JANUARY 2017
* YRC WORLDWIDE INC - AT REGIONAL SEGMENT, FEBRUARY 2018 TONNAGE PER DAY INCREASED ABOUT 0.7% COMPARED TO FEBRUARY 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
